document.full_text: justice john paul stevens may be 91 and retired, but he appears more active than ever ' making speeches, writing a book and telling people what he thinks of recent decisions.
document.title: sidebar: justice stevens is off the bench but not out of opinions
lines_and_colors: justice john paul stevens may be 91 and retired, but he appears more active than ever ' making speeches, writing a book and telling people what he thinks of recent decisions.
